translated: The One Hundred and Eight Names of the Great Wheel-Turning King

analyzed: vajrasattva mahāvajra vajranātha susādhaka
translated: Vajrasattva, great vajra, vajra lord, excellent accomplisher,

original: vajrābhiṣeka vajrābha vajraketu to namo'stu te // //
analyzed: vajra abhiṣeka vajra ābha vajra ketu to namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Vajra consecration, vajra light, vajra banner, homage to you!

analyzed: hāsa vajra mahā dharma vajra kośa mahā vara
translated: Vajra laughter, great Dharma, vajra sheath, great boon,

analyzed: sarva maṇḍala rāja agrya niṣprapañca namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Foremost of all maṇḍala kings, free from conceptual elaboration, homage to you!

analyzed: vajrakarma mahārakṣa caṇḍayakṣa mahāgraha
translated: Vajra action, great protection, fierce yakṣa, great planet,

analyzed: vajra muṣṭi mahā mudra sarva mudra namaḥ astu te
translated: Vajra fist, great seal, all seals, homage to you!

analyzed: bodhi citta mahā bodhe buddha sarva tathāgata
translated: Awakened mind, great enlightenment, Buddha, all thus-gone ones,

analyzed: vajrayāna mahājñāna mahāyāna namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Vajra vehicle, great wisdom, great vehicle, homage to you!

analyzed: sarva artha sarva tattva artha mahāsattva artha sarva vid
translated: All meanings, all true meanings, great being's purpose, all-knowing,

original: sarvajña sarvakṛt sarva sarvadarśi namo'stu te // //
analyzed: sarvajña sarva kṛt sarva sarva darśi namaḥ astu te
translated: Omniscient, all-doing, all, all-seeing, homage to you!

analyzed: vajra ātmaka su vajra agrya vajra vīrya su vajra dhṛk
translated: Vajra nature, excellent vajra foremost, vajra diligence, excellent vajra holder,

analyzed: mahā samaya tattva artha mahā satya namaḥ astu te
translated: Great pledge, true meaning, great truth, homage to you!

analyzed: vajrāṅkuśa mahā kāma surate su mahā prabha
translated: Vajra hook, great desire, excellent love, great light,

analyzed: vajra prabha prabhā udyota buddha prabha namaḥ astu te
translated: Vajra light, illuminating light, Buddha light, homage to you!

analyzed: vajrarāja agrya vajra agrya vidyā agrya agrya narottama
translated: Vajra king, foremost vajra, foremost of the foremost of knowledge, best of men,

analyzed: vajra uttama mahā agrya agrya vidyā uttama namaḥ astu te
translated: Foremost of the foremost of the supreme vajra, foremost of the foremost of knowledge, homage to you!

analyzed: vajra dhāto mahā guhya vajra guhya su guhya dhṛk
translated: Vajra realm, great secret, vajra secret, bearer of the good secret,

analyzed: vajra sūkṣma mahādhyāna vajra kārya namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Vajra subtle, great meditation, vajra action, homage to you!

analyzed: buddha agrya buddha vajra agrya buddha bodhe mahā budha
translated: Foremost of the buddhas, foremost vajra of the buddhas, great enlightened one of the buddha's enlightenment,

analyzed: buddha jñāna mahābuddha buddha buddha namaḥ astu te
translated: Buddha knowledge, great buddha, buddha of the buddhas, homage to you!

analyzed: buddha pūjā mahā pūjā sattva pūjā su pūjaka
translated: Homage to you, great homage of buddha worship, homage to the worshipper of beings,

analyzed: mahopāya mahāsiddhe vajrasiddhi namaḥ astu te
translated: Great means, great accomplishment, vajra accomplishment, homage to you!

analyzed: tathāgata mahākāya tathāgata sarasvate
translated: Tathagata, great body, Tathāgata Sarasvatī,

analyzed: tathāgata mahā citta vajra citta namaḥ astu te
translated: Tathāgata, great mind, vajra mind, homage to you!

analyzed: buddha adhipa jina ājñā kṛt buddha mitra jina agraja
translated: Buddha lord, doer of the Victor's command, buddha friend, elder brother of the Victor,

analyzed: mahāvairocana vibho śānta raudra namaḥ astu te
translated: Great Vairocana, lord, peaceful and wrathful, homage to you!

analyzed: tathāgata mahā tattva bhūtakoṭe mahānaya
translated: Tathāgata, great reality, limit of existence, great method,

analyzed: sarva pāramitā jñāna parama artha namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Knowledge of all perfections, ultimate truth, homage to you!

analyzed: samantabhadra caryā agrya māra mārapramadarka
translated: Samantabhadra, foremost in conduct, conqueror of Māra, delight of the Victor,

analyzed: sarva agrya samatā jñāna sarvatraga namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Knowledge of the equality of all the foremost, going everywhere, homage to you.

analyzed: buddha huṃkara huṃkāra vajra huṃkara dāmaka
translated: Buddha-humkara, humkara, vajra-humkara, giver of gifts,

analyzed: viśva vajra aḍga vajra ugra vajrapāṇe namaḥ astu te  /
translated: Vajra of the universe, fierce vajra, Vajrapani, homage to you.

analyzed: vandayaḥ pūjyaḥ ca mānyaḥ ca satkartavyaḥ tathāgataiḥ
translated: You are to be praised, worshipped, honored, and revered by the Tathagatas.

analyzed: yasmāt vajra dṛḍham cittam vajra sattvaḥ tvam ucyase
translated: Because your mind is firm like a vajra, you are called Vajrasattva.

original: tvadadhīnā hi saṃbodhiḥ pitā tvaṃ sarvadarśinām /
analyzed: tvad adhīnā hi saṃbodhiḥ pitā tvam sarva darśinām
translated: Enlightenment depends on you, you are the father of all the Omniscient Ones.

analyzed: saṃbhūtāḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti tvām āsādya tathāgatāḥ
translated: The Tathagatas who have appeared and will appear come from you.

analyzed: anena stotra rājena yaḥ stuyāt bai su bhaktitaḥ
translated: Whoever praises you with this king of praises with great devotion,

analyzed: yaḥ gāyan tu stuyāt saḥ api bhavet vajradhara upamaḥ
translated: And whoever sings and praises you will become like Vajra Holder.

analyzed: adhyeṣayāmaḥ tvām nātha sarva buddha vaśaṃkaram
translated: We request you, O Lord, the controller of all Buddhas,

analyzed: sarva sattva artha kārya artham utpādaya svakam kulam
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the welfare of all beings, manifest your own family.

analyzed: mahā cakravarti nāma aṣṭottaraśata adhyeṣaṇā stotram sampūrṇam
translated: The one hundred and eight praises of the great Chakravartin are complete.
